name: Default Test Suite
description: A collection of test URLs to validate folder recommendation quality

test_cases.name: python-docs
test_cases.description: Python official documentation - should recommend Python or Documentation folder

test_cases.name: docker-hub
test_cases.description: Docker Hub - should recommend Docker or DevOps folder

test_cases.name: openai-api-docs
test_cases.description: OpenAI API documentation - should recommend LLMs or AI folder

test_cases.description: Hacker News - could be Tech News or Startups

test_cases.name: github
test_cases.description: GitHub - could be Programming or Development Tools
